channel.title: Cannot set SOCKS proxy in Tor Browser
channel.description:
I am trying to connect Tor->SOCKS. I set **network.proxy.socks** in about:config, and it works until I close the browser. After I open the browser again, the socks proxy is reset to `file:///run/anon-ws-disable-stacked-tor/127.0.0.1_9150.sock`
How to permanently change SOCKS proxy in Tor Browser?

item.title: Cannot set SOCKS proxy in Tor Browser

item.description:
This can be configured for sure, but I am not sure yet what the best way for that would be. Will document later.
